channel.title: Dragon Chain + Others Help (Silabs)
channel.description:
I've searched around for a few days and found no answer to this problem, but alof of people have asked about it, Dragon chains make you invisible, now the reason I've kept searching because in this server "http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,221427.0.html" it has images of him with skills capes ect wearing a dragon chain, how is this? Is he using silabs client or what?
[img]http://i184.photobucket.com/albums/x310/Dimebagx/wc.png[/img]
He has skill cape and a d chain :\ how

item.title: Dragon Chain + Others Help (Silabs)
item.dc:creator: @pker4lifeXD pker4lifeXD
item.description:
@pker4lifeXD wrote:

dude use dogs client “can” see the d chain on any 1 with anything else on.
thanks to dog eats dog =p

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Chain + Others Help (Silabs)
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

this problem is not very hard… if the ID of the d chain in the server file is not the same as the one in the client, then you are not spawning the actual d chain: (e.x.e. if your server id for the chain is 9000, but the client says its id for the dchain is 9001, when you type “::pickup 9000 1”, you arent actually picking up the dchain, but what the client says is 9000.

this also goes for equipping. if you say, “equipping id 9000”, it will equip the item designated as ID 9000, not dchain.

Read full topic

why not use silab webclient?

He has skill cape and a d chain :\ how[/quote]Ummm…you do know it’s possible for people to make their own clients inserting items by them selves?
